item.title: 尽管经历了 22 个月的残酷战争，以色列金融市场仍在飙升
item.description:
股价上涨，谢克尔走强，投资滚滚而来，即使死亡人数在增加。【原文：

Stock prices are up, the shekel is strong, and investments are rolling in, even as the death toll rises.

】

item.title: AMD 面临人工智能发展压力 股价跑输英伟达
item.description: 先进微器件公司（Advanced Micro Devices Inc.问题是，这是否足以证明今年的涨势超过了英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc. earnings are expected to show the chipmaker is increasingly benefiting from the artificial intelligence arms race. The question is whether it’s enough to justify a rally that has outpaced Nvidia Corp.’s performance this year.】

item.title: 新兴市场因盈利和降息押注重拾涨势
item.description: 由于央行降息前景和对盈利的乐观情绪提振了风险情绪，新兴市场重拾涨势。【原文：Emerging markets resumed their rally as the prospect of central bank rate cuts and optimism about earnings boosted risk sentiment.】

item.title: 美联储即将降息，杰富瑞认为大型科技公司交易拥挤
item.description: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）公司的一位策略师表示，美联储可能准备引发股市制度变革，让小公司的表现好于大盘科技公司。【原文：The Federal Reserve could be poised to trigger a stock-market regime change that sees smaller companies perform better than megacap tech, according to a strategist at Jefferies.】

item.title: 特朗普征收关税前俄罗斯石油产量保持稳定
item.description:
莫斯科最大的原油买家印度面临对出口到美国的商品征收惩罚性关税

Moscow's biggest crude buyyer India faces punitive levies on goods exported to US

【原文：

Moscow’s biggest crude-buyer India faces punitive levies on goods exported to US

】

item.title: 首席执行官称英国石油公司石油交易因短期交易而强劲
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）通过坚持较短期的交易，在动荡的第二季度取得了比竞争对手更强的石油交易业绩。【原文：BP Plc achieved a stronger oil-trading performance than its rivals during a volatile second quarter by sticking to shorter-duration trades.】

item.title: 竞争白热化后，阿里巴巴将关闭类似好市多的中国门店
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）计划逐步关闭其最后一家类似于好市多（Costco）的会员制商店，这凸显了该公司在竞争激烈的中国零售业的退却。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. plans to gradually wind down the last of its Costco-like members-only stores, underscoring its retreat from a hyper-competitive Chinese retail arena.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长认为 2025 年后仍有降息空间
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，在2025年余下的时间里，菲律宾央行可能会再削减两个季度的货币政策，明年仍有继续宽松周期的空间。【原文：The Philippine central bank has room to continue its easing cycle next year after possibly two more quarter-point cuts for the rest of 2025, according to Governor Eli Remolona.】

item.title: 泰国对特朗普的零关税承诺仍限制美国进口
item.description: 泰国政府一位官员表示，泰国向唐纳德-特朗普总统承诺对美国商品实行近乎完全的市场准入，其中包括保护部分国内产业的关键限制，这也是东南亚国家与华盛顿达成关税协议的条件。【原文：Thailand’s pledge to President Donald Trump of near-total market access for US goods includes key limits to protect some domestic industries, according to a government official, laying out the Southeast Asian nation’s terms for a tariff deal with Washington.】

item.title: 瑞银在季度盈利超预期后扩大债务销售狂潮
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）在季度盈利好于预期之后，几天前刚刚发行了美元债券，现在又以两期票据的形式进入欧元债券市场。【原文：UBS Group AG is diving into the euro bond market with a two-tranche sale of notes, days after raising dollar debt following better-than-expected quarterly earnings.】

item.title: Panmure 称散户投资者避开英国股票转投海外基金
item.description: 据Panmure Liberum分析师称，自2020年以来，英国散户投资者已经抛售了价值超过500亿英镑（664.6亿美元）的国内股票基金，这可能会导致市场表现不佳。【原文：The UK’s retail investors have sold more than £50 billion ($66.46 billion) worth of domestic equity funds since 2020, which could be adding to the market’s underperformance, according to Panmure Liberum analysts.】

item.title: 日本放弃历史上的大米限制，石破茂的命运岌岌可危
item.description: 日本政府将打破数十年来的政策，鼓励农民无视大米生产的实际上限，增加主食大米的种植，这一举措可能会赢得农业部门的支持，并缓解消费者对生活成本飙升的不满。【原文：In a break from a decades-old policy, the Japanese government will encourage farmers to disregard a de facto cap on rice production and boost cultivation of the food staple, a step that could win support from the agriculture sector and soothe consumers’ frustration over soaring living costs.】

item.title: 英国石油公司称，非欧佩克石油供应增长将于 2026 年初达到顶峰
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）首席执行官穆雷-奥金克洛斯（Murray Auchincloss）表示，非欧佩克产油国的石油供应增长将在 2026 年初达到顶峰，而需求依然强劲。【原文：Oil supply growth from non-OPEC producers is set to peak in early 2026, while demand remains robust, according to BP Plc Chief Executive Officer Murray Auchincloss.】

item.title: 什么是 "最低限度关税 "漏洞，为什么特朗普要关闭它？
item.description: 今年，一个在报关行之外鲜为人知的拉丁语词汇成为了头条新闻。这要归功于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普决定关闭 "微量 "商品的关税漏洞。【原文：A Latin term that used to be little-known outside the world of customs brokers has become the stuff of headlines this year. That’s thanks to a decision by US President Donald Trump to close a tariff loophole for “de minimis” merchandise.】

item.title: 受关税影响，英伟达合作伙伴鸿海七月销售额增长乏力
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的主要服务器组装合作伙伴鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s main server assembly partner Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.’s sales growth slowed in July compared to previous few months, signaling that tariff-induced uncertainties are affecting electronics demand.】

item.title: 捷克通胀放缓，央行将维持利率稳定
item.description: 捷克 7 月份通胀放缓，但仍高于中央银行的目标，预计决策者本周将维持利率不变，以应对持续的价格压力。【原文：Czech inflation slowed in July but remained above the central bank’s target as policymakers are expected to keep interest rate unchanged this week to tackle persistent price pressures.】

item.title: 碧桂园寻求将 "起风 "案推迟到今年晚些时候审理
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，碧桂园控股有限公司计划请求香港高等法院将其清盘案推迟到今年晚些时候，此举将为这家中国开发商提供更多时间进行重组。【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co. plans to ask Hong Kong’s High Court to delay its liquidation case until later this year, people familiar with the matter said, a move that would give the Chinese developer more time to work on its restructuring.】

item.title: 联昌国际（CIMB）称 TNG 数码公司成为马来西亚独角兽，正酝酿上市
item.description: 据股东联昌国际集团控股有限公司（CIMB Group Holdings Bhd）称，马来西亚最大的金融科技公司 TNG Digital Sdn 已达到独角兽地位，并将考虑首次公开募股。【原文：TNG Digital Sdn, Malaysia’s largest fintech company, has reached unicorn status and will weigh an initial public offering, according to shareholder CIMB Group Holdings Bhd.】

item.title: Smith & Nephew 因 5 亿美元回购计划和超额利润而大涨
item.description: Smith & Nephew Plc 公布的盈利好于预期，并宣布回购 5 亿美元股票，回报股东多年来的扭亏为盈努力，随后股价大涨。【原文：Smith & Nephew Plc surged after reporting better-than-expected earnings and announcing a $500 million share buyback, rewarding shareholders after a years-long turnaround effort.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气库存增加，陷入五周区间震荡
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格继续在约五周以来的窄幅区间内波动，因为该地区正在稳步增加下个冬季的燃料库存。【原文：European natural gas prices continued to trade in the narrow range they’ve been stuck in for around five weeks as the region steadily boosts fuel stockpiles for next winter.】

item.title: 麦肯锡校友创办的迪拜金融科技公司掀起中东创业热潮
item.description: 由麦肯锡公司两位前顾问创立的迪拜金融科技公司已融资 4800 万美元，彰显了投资者对中东初创企业的持续信心。【原文：A Dubai-based fintech founded by two former McKinsey & Co. consultants has raised $48 million, underscoring continued investor confidence in Middle Eastern startups.】

item.title: 竞争加剧，手套制造商哈塔莱加利润下滑
item.description: 马来西亚手套制造商哈塔莱加控股有限公司（Hartalega Holdings Bhd）因平均销售价格下跌和林吉特坚挺而陷入困境，其季度净收入连续三个季度下滑。【原文：Malaysian glove maker Hartalega Holdings Bhd., grappling with lower average selling prices and a strong ringgit, posted its weakest quarterly net income in three consecutive periods.】

item.title: 供应限制缓解，法国工业生产飙升
item.description: 法国的工业生产出现了五年来的最大增幅，这主要得益于运输材料的增长，因为供应链的制约因素有所缓解。【原文：French industrial production saw its biggest increase in five years, driven by transport materials as supply-chain constraints eased.】

item.title: 克普勒称，随着需求下降，中国 7 月伊朗石油进口量下降
item.description: 上个月，中国的伊朗原油进口量减少了近三分之一，部分原因是私营炼油厂在 6 月份的发货量增加后需求低迷。【原文：China’s imports of Iranian crude contracted by almost a third last month, in part due to subdued demand from private refiners after they saw higher shipments in June.】

item.title: Vingroup Block 推动越南股票外资流出创历史新高
item.description: 越南股票市场周一创下外国资金日流出纪录，Vingroup 股份公司价值约 3.75 亿美元的股票分两批成交。【原文：Vietnam’s equity market saw a record daily outflow of foreign funds Monday, as about $375 million worth of Vingroup JSC shares traded hands in two blocks.】

item.title: 腾讯牵头的一轮融资为乌兹别克斯坦金融科技公司 Uzum 估值 15 亿美元
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司和 VR Capital Group 领投了 Uzum 的一轮股权融资，对这家乌兹别克斯坦金融科技和电子商务公司的估值约为 15 亿美元。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. and VR Capital Group led an equity financing round into Uzum that values the Uzbek fintech and e-commerce company at about $1.5 billion.】

item.title: 高盛称欧洲利润下滑幅度为几十年来最大
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：The stock market is meting out the harshest punishment in decades to companies that fall short of earnings estimates in Europe this quarter, research from Goldman Sachs Group Inc. shows.】

item.title: 菲律宾向个人投资者出售 36.5 亿美元债券
item.description: 菲律宾周二向个人投资者出售了 2100 亿比索（36.5 亿美元）的国债，利用这一关键资金来源来填补预算缺口。【原文：The Philippines sold 210 billion pesos ($3.65 billion) of treasury bonds to individual investors Tuesday, utilizing a key funding source to plug its budget gap.】

item.title: 台积电发现先进芯片制造技术可能泄露
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. has discovered a possible leak of trade secrets related to its advanced chipmaking techniques, and has taken action against staff deemed responsible.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国石油、帝亚吉欧公布财报，英国股市将上涨
